import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import ListAnime from '../Component/ListAnime' import ListBigAnimeCard from '../Component/ListBigAnimeCard' import AnimeCard2 from '../Component/AnimeCard2' import RandomAnime from '../Component/RandomAnime'; import { getAnime } from '../Service/Anime'; export default function HomePage() { const [AnimeList,SetAnimeList]=useState([]) const uri = [ "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/11/30/animevsub-ptJf6ZLFGE.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/07/28/animevsub-ch82vKB7lz.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/10/13/animevsub-TIHly52n6l.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/11/03/animevsub-DYEUQETfFh.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/10/13/animevsub-Amu2bMVysF.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/07/28/animevsub-ch82vKB7lz.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/07/28/animevsub-ch82vKB7lz.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/07/28/animevsub-ch82vKB7lz.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/11/03/animevsub-DYEUQETfFh.jpg", "https://cdn.animevietsub.biz/data/poster/2024/10/13/animevsub-Amu2bMVysF.jpg", ]; useEffect(()=>{ getAnime().then() }) return (
DANH SÁCH ANIME
{uri.map((item) => ( ))}
) }
